Rules.InvariantScript:
Remove(
    colLeadFilter,
    ThisItem
);
Reset(radioStage_1);
Set(varCollectionEmpty,true);
Switch(
    ThisItem.Title,
    "Stage",
    Reset(radioStage_1);
    ,
    "Commit",
    Reset(radioCommit_1),
    "Date From",
    Reset(DateFrom_8);
    Set(
        varCreateddate,
        false
    ),
    "Lead Value",
    Reset(Leadvalue_1),
    "Estimated Closure Date",
    Reset(DateFrom_9);
    Set(
        varEstimated,
        false
    ),
    "Customer",
    Reset(radioCustomers_1),
    "Customer",
    Reset(radioCustomers_1),
    "Area",
    Reset(radioArea_2),
    "Competitor",
    Reset(radioCompetitor_1)
)
"Options onto which the Filter will be applied"

Filter(
    Users,
    Manager.'Primary Email' = User().Email || 'Primary Email' = User().Email
)

// without Custom filter data ---------------------------------------------------------------------
If(
    varCollectionEmpty = true,
    Filter(
        offlineLeadCollection,
        owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
    ),
    If(
        varLeadFilter = true,
        If(
            'Sort gallery_5'.Selected.Title = "Newest",
            Sort(
                If(
                    IsBlank('Leads List View_1'.Customer),
    //For Lead Page-----------------------------------------------------------------
                    Switch(
                        'Filter Gallery_6'.Selected.Value,
                        "This Month",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            Text(
                                createdon,
                                "mmm"
                            ) = Text(
                                Today(),
                                "mmm"
                            )
                        ),
                        "This Week",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                               owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            (DateValue(createdon) >= DateValue(Today()) - Weekday(Today()) + 2 && DateValue(createdon) <= DateValue(Today()) + (9 - Weekday(Today())))
                        ),
                        "Today's Leads",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            IsToday(createdon)
                        )
                    ),
    //For Customer-----------------------------------------------------------------
                    Switch(
                        'Filter Gallery_6'.Selected.Value,
                        "This Month",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                zx_Party.'Customer Code' = LookUp(
                                    'Parties.S',
                                    Parties = 'Leads List View_1'.Customer.zx_Party.Parties
                                ).'Customer Code' && owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            Text(
                                createdon,
                                "mmm"
                            ) = Text(
                                Today(),
                                "mmm"
                            )
                        ),
                        "This Week",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                zx_Party.'Customer Code' = LookUp(
                                    'Parties.S',
                                    Parties = 'Leads List View_1'.Customer.zx_Party.Parties
                                ).'Customer Code' && owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            (DateValue(createdon) >= DateValue(Today()) - Weekday(Today()) + 2 && DateValue(createdon) <= DateValue(Today()) + (9 - Weekday(Today())))
                        ),
                        "Today's Orders",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                zx_Party.'Customer Code' = LookUp(
                                    'Parties.S',
                                    Parties = 'Leads List View_1'.Customer.zx_Party.Parties
                                ).'Customer Code' && owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            IsToday(createdon)
                        )
                    )
                ),
                createdon,
                SortOrder.Descending
            ),
            'Sort gallery_5'.Selected.Title = "Oldest",
            Sort(
                If(
                    IsBlank('Leads List View_1'.Customer),
    //For Lead Page-----------------------------------------------------------------
                    Switch(
                        'Filter Gallery_6'.Selected.Value,
                        "This Month",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            Text(
                                createdon,
                                "mmm"
                            ) = Text(
                                Today(),
                                "mmm"
                            )
                        ),
                        "This Week",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            (DateValue(createdon) >= DateValue(Today()) - Weekday(Today()) + 2 && DateValue(createdon) <= DateValue(Today()) + (9 - Weekday(Today())))
                        ),
                        "Today's Leads",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            IsToday(createdon)
                        )
                    ),
    //For Customer-----------------------------------------------------------------
                    Switch(
                        'Filter Gallery_6'.Selected.Value,
                        "This Month",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                zx_Party.'Customer Code' = LookUp(
                                    'Parties.S',
                                    Parties = 'Leads List View_1'.Customer.zx_Party.Parties
                                ).'Customer Code' && owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            Text(
                                createdon,
                                "mmm"
                            ) = Text(
                                Today(),
                                "mmm"
                            )
                        ),
                        "This Week",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                zx_Party.'Customer Code' = LookUp(
                                    'Parties.S',
                                    Parties = 'Leads List View_1'.Customer.zx_Party.Parties
                                ).'Customer Code' && owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            (DateValue(createdon) >= DateValue(Today()) - Weekday(Today()) + 2 && DateValue(createdon) <= DateValue(Today()) + (9 - Weekday(Today())))
                        ),
                        "Today's Orders",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                zx_Party.'Customer Code' = LookUp(
                                    'Parties.S',
                                    Parties = 'Leads List View_1'.Customer.zx_Party.Parties
                                ).'Customer Code' && owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            IsToday(createdon)
                        )
                    )
                ),
                createdon,
                SortOrder.Ascending
            ),
            'Sort gallery_5'.Selected.Title = "Highest to Lowest",
            Sort(
                If(
                    IsBlank('Leads List View_1'.Customer),
    //For Lead Page-----------------------------------------------------------------
                    Switch(
                        'Filter Gallery_6'.Selected.Value,
                        "This Month",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            Text(
                               createdon,
                                "mmm"
                            ) = Text(
                                Today(),
                                "mmm"
                            )
                        ),
                        "This Week",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            (DateValue(createdon) >= DateValue(Today()) - Weekday(Today()) + 2 && DateValue(createdon) <= DateValue(Today()) + (9 - Weekday(Today())))
                        ),
                        "Today's Leads",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            IsToday(createdon)
                        )
                    ),
    //For Customer-----------------------------------------------------------------
                    Switch(
                        'Filter Gallery_6'.Selected.Value,
                        "This Month",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                zx_Party.'Customer Code' = LookUp(
                                    'Parties.S',
                                    Parties = 'Leads List View_1'.Customer.zx_Party.Parties
                                ).'Customer Code' && owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            Text(
                               createdon,
                                "mmm"
                            ) = Text(
                                Today(),
                                "mmm"
                            )
                        ),
                        "This Week",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                zx_Party.'Customer Code' = LookUp(
                                    'Parties.S',
                                    Parties = 'Leads List View_1'.Customer.zx_Party.Parties
                                ).'Customer Code' && owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            (DateValue(createdon) >= DateValue(Today()) - Weekday(Today()) + 2 && DateValue(createdon) <= DateValue(Today()) + (9 - Weekday(Today())))
                        ),
                        "Today's Orders",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                zx_Party.'Customer Code' = LookUp(
                                    'Parties.S',
                                    Parties = 'Leads List View_1'.Customer.zx_Party.Parties
                                ).'Customer Code' && owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            IsToday(createdon)
                        )
                    )
                ),
                zx_leadvalue,
                SortOrder.Ascending
            ),
            'Sort gallery_5'.Selected.Title = "Lowest to Highest",
            Sort(
                If(
                    IsBlank('Leads List View_1'.Customer),
    //For Lead Page-----------------------------------------------------------------
                    Switch(
                        'Filter Gallery_6'.Selected.Value,
                        "This Month",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            Text(
                               createdon,
                                "mmm"
                            ) = Text(
                                Today(),
                                "mmm"
                            )
                        ),
                        "This Week",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            (DateValue(createdon) >= DateValue(Today()) - Weekday(Today()) + 2 && DateValue(createdon) <= DateValue(Today()) + (9 - Weekday(Today())))
                        ),
                        "Today's Leads",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            IsToday(createdon)
                        )
                    ),
    //For Customer-----------------------------------------------------------------
                    Switch(
                        'Filter Gallery_6'.Selected.Value,
                        "This Month",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                zx_Party.'Customer Code' = LookUp(
                                    'Parties.S',
                                    Parties = 'Leads List View_1'.Customer.zx_Party.Parties
                                ).'Customer Code' && owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            Text(
                               createdon,
                                "mmm"
                            ) = Text(
                                Today(),
                                "mmm"
                            )
                        ),
                        "This Week",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                zx_Party.'Customer Code' = LookUp(
                                    'Parties.S',
                                    Parties = 'Leads List View_1'.Customer.zx_Party.Parties
                                ).'Customer Code' && owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            (DateValue(createdon) >= DateValue(Today()) - Weekday(Today()) + 2 && DateValue(createdon) <= DateValue(Today()) + (9 - Weekday(Today())))
                        ),
                        "Today's Leads",
                        Filter(
                            Filter(
                                offlineLeadCollection,
                                zx_Party.'Customer Code' = LookUp(
                                    'Parties.S',
                                    Parties = 'Leads List View_1'.Customer.zx_Party.Parties
                                ).'Customer Code' && owninguser.'Primary Email' = ComboBox2_8.Selected.'Primary Email'
                            ),
                            IsToday(createdon)
                        )
                    )
                ),
                zx_leadvalue,
                SortOrder.Descending
            )
        ),
 // Custom filter data ---------------------------------------------------------------------
        varLeadFilter = false,
        If(
            'Sort gallery_5'.Selected.Title = "Newest",
            Sort(
                colFilterLeadData,
               createdon,
                SortOrder.Descending
            ),
            'Sort gallery_5'.Selected.Title = "Oldest",
            Sort(
                colFilterLeadData,
               createdon,
                SortOrder.Ascending
            ),
            'Sort gallery_5'.Selected.Title = "Highest to Lowest",
            Sort(
                colFilterLeadData,
                zx_leadvalue,
                SortOrder.Descending
            ),
            'Sort gallery_5'.Selected.Title = "Lowest to Highest",
            Sort(
                colFilterLeadData,
                zx_leadvalue,
                SortOrder.Ascending
            )
        )
    )
)

Remove(
    colLeadFilter,
    ThisItem
);
Reset(radioStage_1);
Set(varCollectionEmpty,true);
Switch(
    ThisItem.Title,
    "Stage",
    Reset(radioStage_1);
    ,
    "Commit",
    Reset(radioCommit_1),
    "Date From",
    Reset(DateFrom_8);
    Set(
        varCreateddate,
        false
    ),
    "Lead Value",
    Reset(Leadvalue_1),
    "Estimated Closure Date",
    Reset(DateFrom_9);
    Set(
        varEstimated,
        false
    ),
    "Customer",
    Reset(radioCustomers_1),
    "Customer",
    Reset(radioCustomers_1),
    "Area",
    Reset(radioArea_2),
    "Competitor",
    Reset(radioCompetitor_1)
)
